attributes.action: hold a referendum in the UK about The Lisbon Treaty which he promised he would do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister promised the voters that when he became PM he would hold a referendum in the UK on the Lisbon Treaty, he is now going back on his word and is trying to force the Treaty through against the wish of the people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
